relnotes.name: Comms Framework

revision.description: Added an extra section to the CommsDebugUtility How To documentation FAQ listing the components which must be properly matched for logging to work on a target. Added extra RDebug output so that if a crash results from mismatched components then more information will be printed for the programmer to understand what has happened.

relnotes.purpose: Provides a framework for communication between the various Comms server threads. For example, the Socket Server, the Telephony Server, and the Serial Comms server use Commsfw to communicate with the Binding Manager in the Root Server.

defect.title: ESock loads all ESK files regardless of their uniqueness

relnotes.defect: ESock will now only load unique ESK files rather than all ESK files on all drives.
